Text: ReadYour message To Sent PM was read on PM

Rick Thanks for your time this morning I appreciate your quick response and look forward to talking with Bob Long For your records my contact information is listed below Let me know if you are interested in discussing other roles at the DOE Cheers Barbara Barbara Eustis Principal Management and Capital Partners Third Avenue New York NY office fax cell wwwromcapitalcom

RE ThursdayGreat I will look forward to meeting you both Give me a call when you get to the hotel cell is and we can find a place to meet in the hotel I usually get upgraded to a suite so if that is the case it is more discreet to meet there Original Message From Shapiro Richard mailtoRichard NRONcom Sent Monday September PM To Subject RE Thursday at the seasons I may bring Jim Steffes along with me Look forward to seeing you I Original Message From Barbara Eustis mailto Sent Monday September PM To Shapiro Richard Subject Thursday Hi Rick Can we get together Thursday at I can meet you in your office or at the Seasons whichever you prefer Barbara Eustis Principal Management and Capital Partners Third Avenue New York NY office fax cell wwwromcapitalcom File Barbara Eustisvcf This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE FPLAEP may be looking for some origination and marketing people Would you consider Columbus OH Original Message From Steffes James D mailtoJamesD NRONcom Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject RE FPL Ill ask around floor Given my background this position does not sound like the best fit Id rather be more on the longterm contracting origination side or business development Thanks for the inquiry As you know things are pretty crazy right now here at Enron I intend to take the week off after Thanksgiving and intend to give you a call during that period Have a great Thanksgiving Jim Original Message From Barbara Eustis ENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Subject FPL Hi Jeff Hope all is well I have a position coming up for a trader at FPL in West Palm Beach dont have many specifics yet but they are dying for someone from Enron Would this be of interest to you or anyone you know Let me know Hope you have a great Thanksgiving I look forward to hearing from you Cheers Barbara Barbara Eustis Principal Management and Capital Partners Third Avenue New York NY office fax cell wwwromcapitalcom Barbara Eustisvcf File Barbara Eustisvcf This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you winmaildat

FPLPaul Good talking with you Attached is the spec we discussed Cheers Barbara Barbara Eustis Principal Management and Capital Partners Third Avenue New York NY office fax cell wwwromcapitalcom Specdoc Barbara Eustisvcf

Cliff BaxterGreg I met you briefly about six weeks ago in Cliffs office I was leaving as you were coming in I am an executive recruiter with Management and Capital Partners I have done a great deal of work in the energy industry I will send you some information on me and my company via FedEx I will be in Houston May June and would love the opportunity to sit down with you for a few minutes I will call your office later in the week to set up an appointment Cheers Barbara Barbara Eustis Principal Management and Capital Partners Third Avenue New York NY office fax cell Barbara Eustisvcf
